Water And Thorns In Kalagari?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Water And Thorns In Kalagari?
By Alchemyst588 on Saturday, October 23, 2010 - 07:36 pm:

OK, I was playing Monster Rancher 4 and I was on an adventure in the Kalagari region and i came to some thorns and i couldn't get through them. Plus I walked down another path and I found some water but none of the monsters i had the 2 times I went there were'nt able to cross. They were Henger (Henger/Henger) Gunbit (Hare/Henger) Dino (Zuum/???) and Ecoliage (Antlan/Plant) What is the matter with these monsters? if a monster can wade through it please tell me.

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, October 26, 2010 - 07:26 pm:

You need monsters with different abilities to get past certain types of obstacles.

By Alchemyst588 on Friday, October 29, 2010 - 01:21 pm:

o... ok i didn't know there actually was a monster trait that helped u get across the water if you can tell me what ability it is and which one that would be very helpful.... btw if this was already on here im srry i couldn't find it.
